name: Terra Nova
description: A newly colonized world, rich in strategic resources. Control of its vast mineral deposits is crucial for the war effort.
battle_reason: Ultramarines are engaging Chaos cults to secure mining operations.

name: Xylos Prime
description: An ancient, ruined Xenos homeworld, rumored to hold powerful relics. Its desolate surface hides forgotten technologies and dangerous entities.
battle_reason: Ork Speedwaaagh! clashes with Death Guard over ancient xenos tech.

name: Veridian Reach
description: A verdant agri-world, vital for sustaining the local population. Its fertile lands are a prime target for any invading force seeking to starve out resistance.
battle_reason: Tyranid vanguard fleet has begun consuming biomass on the agri-world.

name: Forge World Cygnus
description: A vital industrial world, churning out weapons and vehicles for the Imperium. Its factories are under constant threat from various xenos and chaos incursions.
battle_reason: Necron forces are attempting to breach the main forge complex.

name: Shadowfen
description: A desolate, swampy world, known for its hidden ancient ruins and dangerous wildlife. It's a strategic choke point for interstellar travel.
battle_reason: Chaos Space Marines are fortifying positions against T'au incursions.
